Inside the circle, the left half is JIN (BLUE) and the right half is JANG (RED). In the center of the circle, we have the JEDI on the left side and the SITH LORD on the right side from a TOP view. The circle is big enough to contain both JIN/JEDI and JANG/SITH LORD with their sabers extended.
